name: 3DPlatformer Tutorial
description:
This is my 3DPlatformer project.

It is playable for MacOS, Windows, & WebGL

The Modifications I plan on changing:

1.) Visual/audio - if I can I would like to change the player model and reskin the vector based enemies, adding to that if I can find/make audio for the game I would like it to change from level to level or from level to menu screen

2.)Gameplay - I plan on making 3 distinct levels maybe 4 with progressive structure from level to level focusing on creating a more fun experience for the player without the game becoming to frustrating and also too boring.

3.) Menu changes -such as font, size, score, buttons, etc. (overall appeal)

Credits:

Created by Charles Morris
